body_html:
The official ArchLinux build script should work: https://git.archlinux.org/svntogit/community.git/tree/trunk/PKGBUILD?h=packages/tensorflow.
Otherwise you should report bug to the maintainer of the build script.
body_text:
The official ArchLinux build script should work: https://git.archlinux.org/svntogit/community.git/tree/trunk/PKGBUILD?h=packages/tensorflow.
Otherwise you should report bug to the maintainer of the build script.
body:
The official ArchLinux build script should work: https://git.archlinux.org/svntogit/community.git/tree/trunk/PKGBUILD?h=packages/tensorflow.
Otherwise you should report bug to the maintainer of the build script.
